main event: A UFO was observed hovering and pulsating in the sky for 12 minutes in Ludlow, Massachusetts on January 17, 1963.
interesting points: The UFO was estimated to be 40 ft in diameter and 12 ft in thickness., The object was reported at an elevation of 30 degrees and azimuth of 135 degrees., Witnesses reported the object flying north., Wind information was included in the report., The sighting lasted for 12 minutes and was classified as a ground-visual observation.
witness description: Miss Ludlow and Mrs. Lucy Ludlow
